setting.name: PROXYNAME
setting.label: PROXYNAME
setting.description: Defines the Home Proxy Domain Name.If specified, the Proxy Name is used as Request-URI in REGISTER, INVITE and other SIP messages. If not specified, the Proxy IP address is used instead.

setting.name: PROXYIP
setting.label: PROXYIP
setting.description: IP address and optionally port number of the primary Proxy server you are using. Enter the IP address as FQDN or in dotted format notation for example 201.10.8.1. You can also specify the selected port in the format: IP Address:port

setting.name: ISPROXYUSED
setting.label: Use Proxy
setting.description: Don’t Use Proxy [0] = Proxy isn’t used, the internal routing table is used instead.Use Proxy [1] = Proxy is used.If you are using a Proxy server, enter the IP address of the primary Proxy server in the Proxy IP address field. If you are not using a Proxy server, you must configure the Tel to IP Routing table on the gateway

setting.name: ISREGISTERNEEDED
setting.label: Registration Needed
setting.description: No [0] = Gateway doesn’t register to Proxy / Registrar .Yes [1] = Gateway registers to Proxy / Registrar when the device is powered up and every RegistrationTime seconds.

setting.name: MAXDIGITS
setting.label: Maximum Digits
setting.description: Maximum number of digits that can be dialed. The valid range is 1 to 49.
